title: Cannot login to Riot games support
body: I've been trying to log in to Riot games support to send a ticket after my account was suspended for 2 weeks. I fill in my login details, no robot and all but it keeps instantly signing me out. I've tried to do it on another browser and it works but my tickets keep being deleted for some reason. "Request not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted"

replies.body: You may need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) if you're able to access the site on one browser but not the other.  The request not found might be happening because you have to be logged in to the account that created the ticket, otherwise it won't be possible to view the ticket.  No worries, though, you can also reach out to us via support@riotgames.com.  See you there!
